subject: Re: Order #SSN3730, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi the up shifter is sticky I released 1 screw a tiny bit to get it to work but the magnets on the up shift is definitely not as strong as the downshift so I recon as a seasoned SIM racer that the up shifter is faulty so just wondering if you could send a replacement shifter rather than me sending the wheel back and waiting a month for a replacement?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
From: SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>
Sent: Sunday, December 14, 2025 4:54:00 PM
To: jamesyta26@hotmail.com <jamesyta26@hotmail.com>
Subject: Order #SSN3730, how did it go?

Hello dafydd, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi DAFYDD JAMES,  Please provide your detailed shipping information and we will resend the item to you.

Hi these are my orders details

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Just wondering when you are going to resolve this issue I was going to buy your pro handbrake but am a bit unsure wether to buy off you as replies to complaints are very slow not as I would expect from a large companies like yourselves

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
